TextAsset.value: ...People give me presents and stuff like that, like, all the time.
It’s all because they want me to like them.
Maybe this sounds silly, but… It gets to be, like, kinda depressing, yknow?
But this time, this gift…
I can like… totally feel it’s real.
...Thank you, ${slot:playerName}.
Donko… you really do understand!
Besides, going to a cool concert with ME…
I can only imagine what that’ll do for YOUR popularity!
Very clever, honey!
I think you’re finally starting to learn!
You’re gonna be more popular than EVER!
Huh?
Wait!
But that’s not why I-
I better go get ready. Thanks again!
Does Donko even… understand why I did that?
Does she understand that I’m doing it so we can…
Oh, well.
There’s no way to miss the signals I’m giving her, right?)
Be true to yourself!
Huh?! Pac-Man?!
I said, be true to yourself! It’s the only way to understand your feelings for Donko!
Huh…
Well, I don’t know how you knew what I was thinking about…
I have my ways.
...Right…
Anyway…
I don’t really know what you mean.
How am I not being true to myself?
You know in your heart how you feel about Donko.
And I think you know deep down, Donko feels the same!
So why do you keep doubting her and ignoring how you feel?
It’s… kinda weird that you know so much about this…
Well, whatever.
It’s not MY fault I’m doubting how I feel! It’s her’s!
She straight-up admitted how manipulative she is.
And lately it seems like whenever I try to confront her, she pretends not to get it.
It’s so annoying!
Please remember that growing up as a young drum can be very difficult, ${slot:playerName}.
I was young once, and I may not be a drum…
But I am vaguely circle-shaped.
So it’s basically the same thing.
Donko may seem to have an easy life, but do you think that’s completely true?
I don’t know!
It seems pretty easy to me.
Everyone likes her and she always gets whatever she wants.
You’re being awfully hard on her.
Be true to what you really feel, ${slot:playerName}…
It’s hard to be her. If you like her, trust her to open up to you eventually.
Pac-Man, it’s not that I don’t appreciate your advice, it just seems...
Well you’re not the one who actually has to deal with her, you know?
So this is all pretty rich, coming from you!
You mean… BUDDY Rich?!
Huh?
He’s… a famous… drummer…
See, because, Donko is… you know...
It’s one of those… drum.. puns…
You might be… too young… to get it…
I’ll see myself out.
(I don’t really get what Pac-Man was trying to tell me…
I’ll have to ask him about it later. I’m sure nothing tragic and surprising will happen to prevent me from doing that.
The rest of the school day passes uneventfully.
All I can think about is my date with Donko tonight.
...I hope it’s a date, anyway…
Finally, it comes time to head to the cafe for the concert.
There, ready to meet me, is Donko…)
Hi ${slot:playerName}!
Wow, what’d you do?
Come here straight from school without even like, getting changed?
Haha! Maybe I don’t have to get dressed up…
To look
good.
Tee-hee!
You’ve got to work on your flirting, honey…
But don’t worry, you’re not TOTALLY hopeless.
(She knows I’m flirting?
Maybe she does understand, after all!
I’m too excited by that to point out that Donko didn’t change anything she’s wearing, either.
At least… Not as far as I can tell…)
Let’s go, honey!
(After that, we have a great time at the concert together.
Donko loves music, and loves to dance…
I have fun dancing with her, even though I’m terrible at it!
I’m starting to forget why I was feeling so crummy about this.
And after the music is done…
I’ll ask Donko on a romantic walk.
Then we can figure out what exactly we’re doing here.)
Phew! This is so great!
I’ve like, NEVER had so much fun in my LIFE!
...Thank you, ${slot:playerName}.
I’m glad we did this, Donko.
I know things have been weird, but I just wanted to say-
Oh, it looks like the band is done with the encore…
What a totally AMAZING show!
Uh, yeah.
I mean, now that the concert is over…
Well, what I mean to say is, I was thinking we could-
Hi, Donko!
Great show, wasn’t it?
(Where’d she come from? I was right in the middle of a sentence!)
Aki! Hiii!
I’m surprised to see you here, girl!
Aren’t you, like, the Reigning Queen of being too busy for fun?!
I’m 100% passionate about music!
Actually, I’m 100% passionate about every one of my pursuits.
Including partying… but only for a regulated few seconds, of course.
So I’ll see you at the afterparty, you two!
Afterparty?!
O. M. G.
I didn’t even know there was going to be one!
We have to go!
Er, I don’t know-
I was sorta hoping we could-
Yo, Donko! Yo, Cuz!
How RAD was this concert?!
I’m SO PUMPED!
MUSIC RULES!
(Another interruption?? Can’t anyone see we’re having a private conversation?!)
It was totally rad, yo!
PLEASE tell me you two are going to the afterparty.
It’s gonna be off the chain!
Afterparties are like getting REVENGE on the first party… with FUN!
Oh yeah! ${slot:playerName} and me will be there FOR SURE!
But…
${slot:playerName}...
I’m starting to think you had an ulterior motive for inviting me here!
O-Oh! Actually, yeah, I-
HELLO MORTALS.
GALAGA ASSUMES YOU ARE GOING TO THE AFTERPARTY?
IT IS GOING TO BE OUT OF THIS WORLD.
Teehee… of course we are!
(Should I be jealous?!)
Anyway, ${slot:playerName}… you can’t hide your true intentions from me!
Nice try, though! Tee hee!
You do?
Sure! This wasn’t just about the concert...
It was about the AMAZING afterparty!
The top student is going, the captain of the Wrestleball team, the hottest student in class…
(...Yeah, I’m jealous.)
...And ME!
What’s more, all those SUPER IMPORTANT people will see you at the party WITH me!
I’m so proud…
You came up with this all on your own, and it’s gonna make you SUPER popular.
The student… has become the master!
A-actually… I was hoping we could go on a little walk instead?
Tee-hee! Good joke, honey.
Go on a walk with you in the middle of nowhere, or go to the hottest party of the year?
DUH! Let’s go, already! I’m too excited to be fashionably late.
Donko…
You don’t really think that’s all I care about, do you?
Come on, please come with me?
Like, why do you want to take a dumb WALK so badly?!
You’re gonna blow your newfound popularity with weirdness again!
I thought we could…
You know…
Talk about our…
...feelings.
Fine! My feelings are, you’re being really, like, annoying about this!
Come on!
Don’t you want to be popular?!
NO!
What?
Donko…
I don’t care about being popular!
That was just something you decided for me!
But don’t you want to have, like, tons of friends and stuff?
Not really… I mean, it’d be nice, but…
I don’t want to change who I am to get that.
I’d rather, you know…
March to the beat of my own drum.
...Huh? Is that a reference to something?
I’m not familiar with that phrase.
SERIOUSLY?!
Are you saying you…
don’t want my help anymore?
Well, yeah!
...I see…
If that’s how it is, then…
I don’t want to waste my time on a loser like you, either.
What?!
No, that’s not what I meant.
I still want to spend time with you!
I mean, of course I do, that’s the whole point…
Then why are you being so, like, MEAN to me?
WAAAAH!
Oh, jeez…
Donko, please don’t cry…
Sniff.. Hic…
All I wanted to do was take you to a cool afterparty…
So you could be… sniff… popular…
And now you won’t even… sniff… do that!
C’mon, I-
...Wait a minute.
You’re still talking about the afterparty…
You’re… You’re…
Sniff… Huh?
I can’t believe it!
You’re STILL just trying to get me to do what you want!
You think you can just turn on the water works and I’ll fall in line, like your own personal marching band!
I thought you cared about me…
${slot:playerName}… I do care!
W-Waaaaaaahhhh!
Yeah, right! I’m leaving!
Well, like… sniff… FINE!
You’re… you’re just some LOSER who nobody cares about ANYWAY!
You can’t even play the TUBA!
WAAAHHH!
G-good luck snaring a better friend than me!
(Wow…
I know Donko’s feelings are hurt… I know that’s probably why she saying this stuff.
But still… it stings.
I’m really good at the tuba!)
Sniff… Sniff…
W-well…
If you just think of me as some loser you took pity on…
Then… I guess that’s it.
Good night, Donko.
(I didn’t wait to hear her reply. I turned and walked away as fast as I could.
I don’t know if you’ve ever turned your back on a crying drum…
But believe me, it’s harder than it sounds.)
